name: Harsh
description: Open World Survival RPG set in a high fantasy environment. Craft items and fortresses, wield spells and magical equipment as you face everything from undead to intelligent factions whose reaction towards you is based on your treatment of them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7sp1 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or higher Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 10 GB available space
